description: CRITICAL: API endpoint /process/execute on port 2280 allows arbitrary command execution without authentication. This is a Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability. The API accepts POST requests with commands and executes them as the 'daytona' user.
notes: Tested command execution with /process/execute POST endpoint. Successfully executed 'whoami' command, returned 'daytona' as the executing user. This endpoint has ZERO authentication and allows arbitrary system commands. This is an UNAUTHENTICATED REMOTE CODE EXECUTION vulnerability of the highest severity."
